definition: Shangjie District of Zhengzhou City 鄭州市|郑州市[Zheng4 zhou1 Shi4], Henan

sentences.english: Many Vancouver neighbourhoods have their own local festivals.
sentences.chinese: 温哥华很多街区有自己的节日。

sentences.english: Or they move away from the old neighborhood and different groups move in.
sentences.chinese: 他们可能从老街区迁出，而不同的群体搬入。

sentences.english: Some neighborhoods have a Starbucks on every block or two.
sentences.chinese: 一些相邻的地方，每一两个街区就有一家星巴克。

sentences.english: Waves could be seen splashing into city streets and over bridges.
sentences.chinese: 可以看到波浪涌入城市街区，甚至是溅到桥上。
这个街区拥有200座风格不一的日式建筑。

sentences.english: I live three blocks away, on Croton Street.
sentences.chinese: 我住的地方离这里三个街区，在克罗顿街。

sentences.english: Each of them is three units high and stretches a block in each direction.
sentences.chinese: 每栋楼三层，向每个方向延伸出一个街区的长度。

sentences.english: Xiamen's old quarter gets a little bit crowded.
Walking more than 72 blocks did not appear to increase gray matter volume any further.
sentences.chinese: 步行超过72街区的人们看来没有再增加脑灰质容量。

sentences.english: I walked the dog around the block a few times.
sentences.chinese: 我绕着这个街区溜过几次狗。

sentences.english: The historic districts adjacent river is the quintessence of ancient urban design and construction in Suzhou.
sentences.chinese: 临河历史街区是苏州古代城市设计和建设的精华所在。

sentences.english: There's Murphy the baker, who runs the pastry shop on the next block.
sentences.chinese: 有面包师墨非，在隔壁街区开了一家糕饼店。

sentences.english: Mention where you live, if you live on the same block.
sentences.chinese: 指出自己住在什么地方，如果你住同一个街区内。

sentences.english: The government there actually funds block parties to bring communities together.
sentences.chinese: 那里的政府组织建立街区聚会，为了把社区聚起来。

sentences.english: The Interstate is, like, two blocks from my house.
sentences.chinese: 州际公路好像离我们家两个街区的路程。

sentences.english: It's at this point that these three neighbourhoods adjoin.
sentences.chinese: 这三个街区在这一点毗连。

definition: Laocheng district of Luoyang City 洛陽市|洛阳市[Luo4 yang2 shi4], Henan
